org.dexpi.pid.imaging.drawableElements

Class ShapeElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dexpi.pid.imaging.drawableElements.DrawableElement
      • org.dexpi.pid.imaging.drawableElements.ShapeElement

  • public class ShapeElement
extends DrawableElement
    The shape element. Describes a closed polygon defined by arrays of x and y coordinates. Each pair of (x, y) coordinates defines a point. The polygon is defined by a sequence of line segments, connecting the points. The figure is automatically closed by a line connecting the final point to the first point, if those points are different.
    Author:
    El Pulpo
